# Weekly Documentation Update Input

Use this file to capture the work completed during the period.

## Period

- From: YYYY-MM-DD
- To: YYYY-MM-DD

## Tasks

### Task 1: [FEAT] Short title

- What changed
- Why it changed
- Docs that should be updated

### Task 2: [FIX] Short title

- What changed
- Why it changed
- Docs that should be updated

## Notes

- Optional context for reviewers
